Something you forgot to pack? You’ll find it here. Just a 5-minute walk away from the Slush Venue, Tripla is a shopping mall including a music museum, movie theater, and plenty of restaurants and cafes.

Psst! There’s also a Badge Claim point.

📍Mall of Tripla, Fredikanterassi 1 / Website
